text.more: Objects are color coded by community, grouped by industry and arranged by date and location. As hyperlinking is unavailable for this tool, please copy and paste the contents of the "object location" field to visit the item's page.
text.intro:
Mapping Language: 
Representation of  Immigrant Communities in the Pacific Northwest, 1880-1930

legend.nodeLabel: Community Color Codes: Fuchsia = Black, Red = Chinese,  Light Purple = Irish,  Orange = Italian,  Dark Purple = Filipino,  Brown = Finnish,  Light Blue = German,  Dark Blue = Greek,  Pink = Hindu,  Light Green = Japanese,  Dark Green = Korean,  Yellow = Native Americans,  Dark Green = Norwegian,  Aqua = Polish
